sentence: On CNBC's "Fast Money Halftime Report," Kourtney Gibson said that investors are buying Environmental, Social, and Governance stocks for the long term and now is an interesting time to buy these stocks.
She likes Brookfield Renewable Partners LP (NYSE: BEP) in the space.
Sarat Sethi likes XPO Logistics Inc (NYSE: XPO) a lot.
He sees a lot of value in the stock and he thinks that you can buy it at these levels.
Jim Lebenthal would buy more of Dow Inc (NYSE: DOW), but he already has a large position.
He thinks the dividend is safe and he likes the stock for the long term.
Karen Firestone likes Home Depot Inc (NYSE: HD) at its current price level.
She thinks people are going to spend more money on their homes and that is not going to end for many quarters to come.
